channel.title: Devlog on Studio Nugget Devlog
channel.description: Recent content in Devlog on Studio Nugget Devlog

item.title: Operation Tempest – Devlog #1
item.description: Hello and welcome to the first devlog post for Studio Nugget’s first game, (working title) Operation Tempest! My name is Jacob and I am the project lead for Operation Tempest. I’m writing this first of many (sporadic) blog posts to document our project’s journey from the beginning stages to a fully developed game. All of us here at Studio Nugget are now working on this game full time and we’re very excited to begin sharing information about it.
